title: Identify the elements involved
text: Look at the reactants and products in the reaction. Which elements are present?

title: Determine oxidation states
text: Assign oxidation states to each element in the reactants and products. Remember that the oxidation state of a pure element is $$0$$.

title: Identify changes in oxidation states
text: Compare the oxidation states of each element in the reactants and products. Which element's oxidation state increases? Which decreases?

title: Define oxidation and reduction
text: Remember that oxidation is the loss of electrons (increase in oxidation state), and reduction is the gain of electrons (decrease in oxidation state).

title: Identify the reducing agent
text: The reducing agent is the substance that gets oxidized. Which element loses electrons?
